User Stories: As a user, I would like to choose my article preferences so that I am given more similar articles in the future.
Tasks: Article preferences saved in user account tables.
Article keywords saved to relate one article to another.
GUI feature to allow yes/no article preferences.

User Stories: As a user, I would like to manage my article preferences so that I can remove any mistaken preferences.
Tasks: Add interface section under User Profile for preference management.
List preferences in order with Yes/No toggle.
